meanings.definition: In a calm and composed manner, without showing fear or anxiety.
meanings.sent1: She faced the spider nervelessly, not flinching at all.
meanings.sent2: He spoke nervelessly in front of the large audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat watched the mouse nervelessly, pretending not to care.
meanings.sent4: The mountain stood nervelessly against the raging storm.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter entered the burning building nervelessly, focused on saving lives.

meanings.sent1: Her nervelessly steady hands performed the delicate surgery.
meanings.sent2: The nervelessly calm lake reflected the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent3: The toddler slept nervelessly through the noisy thunderstorm.
meanings.sent4: The old tree stood nervelessly in the face of the strong winds.
meanings.sent5: The detective approached the suspect nervelessly, ready to uncover the truth.
